LanguageData.RefinedPlanetarium.stages.0.label: Consuming planetarium
LanguageData.RefinedPlanetarium.stages.0.description: It smells oddly like cinnamon. It tastes similar to various spices.
LanguageData.Braincrystal.stages.0.label: Eating brain crystal

LanguageData.PlanetariumTea.stages.0.label: Drinking planetarium tea
LanguageData.PlanetariumTea.stages.0.description: Such a rich and deep scent! I can feel my head clearing already...
